      • hasMain

        public static boolean hasMain(Class<?> clz)
        Test if a class has a "public static main(String [] args)" method
        Parameters:
        clz - the class
        Returns:
        true if main method exists; false otherwise

      • getMain

        public static Method getMain(Class<?> clz)
        Get the "public static main(String [] args)" method of the class, or null if it doesn't have one.
        Parameters:
        clz - the class
        Returns:
        the main method, or null if it doesn't exist

      • getTypeArguments

        public static <T> List<Class<?>> getTypeArguments(Class<T> baseClass,
                                                  Class<? extends T> childClass)
        Get the actual type arguments a child class has used to extend a generic base class. An implementation kindly described in this blog post: http://www.artima.com/weblogs/viewpost.jsp?thread=208860 by
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the base class
        Parameters:
        baseClass - the base class
        childClass - the child class
        Returns:
        a list of the raw classes for the actual type arguments.
